text:
Seeing an issue with GraphQL queries that reference the id via metadata. the ID's are being returned as string "Optional[{{ID}}]" with the Id being wrapped in brackets. We are seeing this in multiple portals.

ex: *[{_metadata={id=Optional[12241522024]},...*

Thanks for reporting this. There looks to have been a bug with a recent fix for some errors with this field.

I rolled back this change, can you try again and let me know if you are still seeing this issue?
It's fixed! Thank you for the quick response.
Glad that fixed it! Apologies for the trouble here, please feel free to ping me if you start seeing this again or any other issues. Thanks!

Hi, we created property for our contacts containing a encoded html (kind of a badge) for our top customers. we want them to put it on their websites so we want to deliver email to them with code that is ready to copy/paste. We created new property for our contacts with encoded html. we encoded `
Badge
` to: `<div>Badge</div>` But when I pull data form our property to email `{{contact.badge_property}}` I’m getting this reencoded one more time :slightly_smiling_face: `<div>Badge</div>` I’m looking for a solution of this problem.
